name: Desert Falcon
description: In the air, on land, and up the Nile River, you gather jewels for points, while picking up sets of hieroglyphics for extra powers. But watch out for the kamikaze-like Scarabs, the flame-throwing Fire Pots, and the burrowing Ewes. If you can outmaneuver these enemies, and destroy them with fireballs, you can face the ultimate confrontation with the deadly Sphinx!
